title: Apple, Intel and these other US tech companies have the most at stake in China-US trade fight
text: 1.19 +0.00 ( +0.04% ) Apple, Intel and these other US tech companies have the most at stake in China-US trade fight Evelyn Cheng Reblog Apple and Intel are on a list of 16 U.S. companies that made a total $105.5 billion from China last year, or 23 percent of overall revenues, Jefferies analysts said Monday. As a result of U.S. commercial interests, they expect the Trump administration to pursue concessions from Beijing, rather than an outright break in technology-related trade. Shares of optical component makers working directly or indirectly with ZTE rose in Monday morning trading after President Donald Trump unexpectedly said the U.S. would help the Chinese telecom equipment giant get back into business quickly.
